text:
OoOooOO this looks great <@U25C65C3S> - Congrats on getting it live!

Let me know if you have interest in putting a case study together for the CMS Dev Blog. We can showcase how it was built + get exposure to the website + free seo link. We have ~3K subscribers.
DM me if you're interested. If you don't have time, no worries :slightly_smiling_face:
